scripts.git: git add . && echo 'do a git publish after comment.' && git commit -m
scripts.deploy: node -e "const dateTime = require('moment')().format('MM/DD/YYYY HH:mm:ss'); require('child_process').execSync(`git add . && git commit -m "Release at ${dateTime}" && git push`, { stdio: [0, 1, 2]} );"
